description: WarpTimeSeriesImageMultiTransform is a tool used to apply a series of transformations to a time series image, either forward or reverse, using affine transforms and warps.

image_dimension.title: Image Dimension
image_dimension.description: The dimensionality of the input images (3D or 4D).

moving_image.title: Moving Image
moving_image.description: The image to which the transformation will be applied. It can be a 3D image with vector voxels or a 4D image with scalar voxels.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The output image after transformation. It is resampled based on the reference image domain.

reference_image.title: Reference Image
reference_image.description: The reference image that defines the space into which the input image will be warped.

transforms.title: Transforms
transforms.description: A list of transformation files, such as affine transformation matrices and warps, applied in sequence.

interpolation.title: Interpolation
interpolation.description: Specifies the type of interpolation to use: Nearest Neighbor or 3rd order B-Spline.
